query:
ALTER TABLE aec_detected_errors 
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS stack_trace text AFTER message,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS endpoint varchar(255) AFTER source,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS user_context text AFTER endpoint;
